ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Tech question
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks all for the help.  I do have a SB card now, so I ll check that the drivers are latest & greatest.  If they are I ll try knocking back the acceleration.
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks all for the help. I do have a SB card now, so I'll check that the
drivers are latest & greatest. If they are I'll try knocking back the
acceleration. I've already upgraded to DirectX 7.0 though, so that's out.

Peace
Evulia, dreaming of the Karanas and hearing a silver mist wolf cry
"wowowowowowowowowowowowowowowowowoof!" in her sleep. ;^)

PS: What if the new guy plays a mana battery?





Talies the
Wanderer To: eqbards@egroups.com
<snicker@pink cc:
pig.com> Subject: Re: [eqbards]
Tech question
10/17/2000
03:27 PM
Please
respond to
eqbards






Make sure that you have the latest version of DirectX - 7.0 seems to work
fine.
The strange sound effects seem to be something related to Soundblasters -
mine does that all the time, and I heard about it a lot while Guiding. You
might also check to make sure that you have the latest drivers from
Creative Labs.

As to leaving, well, I have to stand up for my beliefs. I find it rather
ironic that one of the last statements I made to my former server GM was
"For the love of god, hire a real PR man. Abashi is the worst thing to
happen to Verant because of his unswerving attitudes. You have to be
willing to admit you make mistakes, or the public will instinctively
mistrust you."

Heh - I guess it worked ;)

Talies the Wanderer



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

with the subject submissions.
